mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_block (bl_uid, bl_writer, bl_title, bl_description, bl_mainCtg, bl_smCtg, bl_date, bl_objId) VALUES (#{boardDTO.bl_uid}, #{session_iuid}, #{boardDTO.bl_title}, #{boardDTO.bl_description}, #{boardDTO.bl_mainCtg}, #{boardDTO.bl_smCtg}, SYSDATE, #{boardDTO.bl_objId})
mapper.select: SELECT B.bl_writer, B.bl_title, B.bl_description, B.bl_mainCtg, B.bl_smCtg, B.bl_date, B.bl_objId, I.bti_url FROM tbl_block B INNER JOIN tbl_thumbImg I ON B.bl_uid = I.bti_ref WHERE B.bl_uid = #{bl_uid}
SELECT bt_name FROM tbl_blockTags WHERE bt_ref = #{bl_uid}
